description:
This means to lack, or have none of something.

CJK Ideographs are characters used in Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages. Their writing systems all completely or partly use Chinese characters.
apple_vendor_description: Apple‚Äôs rendition of the Japanese 'Free of Charge' button is a striking, circular emblem featuring a bold red border and a crisp white background. In the center, the kanji characters for 'muryo' (free) are presented in a clean, sharp font, adhering to Apple's design philosophy of clarity and precision. On Apple devices, the button possesses a subtle 3D effect, suggesting it's a tangible element ready to be tapped, perfect for indicating something is complimentary or offered without cost.
